results.title: Ischemic preconditioning and atenolol on lung injury after intestinal ischemia and reperfusion in rats.
results.text_hl: The aim of this study was evaluate the beta blocker @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@AT@@@) and @DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ preconditioning (IPC) strategies for tissue protection against systemic effects of @DISEASE_Intestinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007410 @@@intestinal ischemia@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Hypersensitivity_Immediate</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006969 @@@I)@@@ and @DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@reperfusion (R) injury@@@.

citations.NLM: Bonservizi WG, Koike MK, Saurim R, Felix GA, da Silva SM, Montero EF, Taha MO. Ischemic preconditioning and atenolol on lung injury after intestinal ischemia and reperfusion in rats. Transplant Proc. 2014 Jul-Aug;46(6):1862-6. PMID: 25131055
